attrDefaultMaterial.name: default_material
attrDefaultMaterial.label: default material
attrDefaultMaterial.comment: The default material to use if no material was specified for the incoming ray type.

attrCameraRayMaterial.name: camera_ray_material
attrCameraRayMaterial.label: camera ray material
attrCameraRayMaterial.comment: The material to use if the incoming ray is a camera ray.

attrIndirectMirrorRayMaterial.name: indirect_mirror_ray_material
attrIndirectMirrorRayMaterial.label: indirect mirror ray material
attrIndirectMirrorRayMaterial.comment: The material to use if the incoming ray is an indirect mirror ray.

attrIndirectGlossyRayMaterial.name: indirect_glossy_ray_material
attrIndirectGlossyRayMaterial.label: indirect glossy ray material
attrIndirectGlossyRayMaterial.comment: The material to use if the incoming ray is an indirect glossy ray.

attrIndirectDiffuseRayMaterial.name: indirect_diffuse_ray_material
attrIndirectDiffuseRayMaterial.label: indirect diffuse ray material
attrIndirectDiffuseRayMaterial.comment: The material to use if the incoming ray is an indirect diffuse ray.

attrCutoutCameraRays.name: cutout_camera_rays
attrCutoutCameraRays.label: cutout camera rays
attrCutoutCameraRays.comment: If true, this material acts as a cutout material, i.e. we terminate any rays that encounter this material.
